statements: DELETE FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE event_name = 'Clean and Jerk';
DELETE FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 123 AND event_name = 'Squat' AND weight_lifted >= 200.00;
DELETE FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_name = 'John Doe' AND event_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM weightlifting_events WHERE event_name = 'Clean and Jerk';
DELETE FROM weightlifting_performance WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM weightlifting_events WHERE location = 'Gym A' AND event_date >= '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM weightlifting_results WHERE result >= 200 AND lift_type = 'Clean and Jerk';
